{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Shiny Charm |image = [[File:Bag_Shiny_Charm_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Shiny Charm''. |dex = 70 |effect = Encounter shinies more often }} The '''Shiny Charm''' is a type of Oak item. When equipped, it increases the probability of encountering a shiny Pokémon. == Details == == Description == Encounter shinies more often. == Acquisition == Catch 70 Unique Pokémon. {{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]]
